verbose_text: Hernandez et al. have recently demonstrated in vitro how triclosan, a detergent antibiotic used in cosmetic, binds the regulator SmeT of the SmeDEF pump in S. maltophilia, leading to the over-expression of the pump and consequent multi-drug resistance.
evidence: triclosan, a detergent antibiotic used in cosmetic, binds the regulator SmeT of the SmeDEF pump
